# Intro

# Setup

```{r}
#| warning: false
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(purrr)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
data_folder <- 'data'
function_folder <- 'R'

theme_base <- 
    theme(
    plot.margin = margin(10,5,5,5),
    axis.ticks = element_line(),
    axis.line = element_line(),
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.box = "vertical"
  )

a <- theme_set(
  theme_minimal(
    base_size = 15,
  ) +
    theme_base
)

# source all functions
list.files(
  function_folder,
  full.names = T
) %>% 
  walk(source)
```
